title: My BBQ Sauce
ingredients: ['250ml ketchup', '4 tablespoons vinegar', '70g dark brown soft sugar', '2 tablespoons chopped onion', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1/4 teaspoon black pepper', '1/8 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 pinch celery salt', '1 pinch mustard powder']
